mapper.select: select tp_num, c.cor_region, cor_longi, cor_lati, u_id, tp_date from cordinates c, trip_plan t where c.cor_region = t.cor_region and t.u_id=#{u_id} order by tp_date

select * from users u, trip_plan t, cordinates c where u.u_id!=#{u_id} and u.u_id = t.u_id and c.COR_REGION=t.COR_REGION and TO_CHAR(t.tp_date,'YYYY/MM/DD')=SUBSTR(#{tp_date},0,4)||'/'||SUBSTR(#{tp_date},6,2)||'/'||SUBSTR(#{tp_date},9,2) and c.cor_lati=(select cor_lati from cordinates c where cor_region=#{cor_region}) and c.cor_longi=(select cor_longi from cordinates c where cor_region=#{cor_region})
select tp.*, u.* from trip_plan tp, users u where tp.u_id = u.u_id and tp.u_id != #{u_id} and tp.cor_region = #{cor_region} and tp.tp_date = #{tp_date} order by tp_date ASC
select ag.tp_date, ag.cor_region, ag.max_people_num, ag.accomp_group_num from Accomp_group ag where #{u_id}=ag.u_id

select count(ar.acr_ox) from Accomp_group ag, Accomp_group_list agl, AccompanyRequest ar where ag.u_id=#{u_id} and agl.accomp_group_num = #{accomp_group_num} and agl.accomp_group_num = ag.accomp_group_num and ag.accomp_group_num = ar.accomp_group_num and ar.u_id=agl.u_id and ar.acr_ox = 'o' group by agl.accomp_group_num
select ag.tp_date, ag.cor_region, ag.max_people_num, ag.accomp_group_num from Accomp_group ag, AccompanyRequest ar where #{u_id}=ar.u_id and ag.accomp_group_num = ar.accomp_group_num

select count(ar.acr_ox) from Accomp_group ag, Accomp_group_list agl, AccompanyRequest ar where ag.u_id=#{u_id} and agl.accomp_group_num =#{group_id} and agl.accomp_group_num = ag.accomp_group_num and ag.accomp_group_num = ar.accomp_group_num and ar.u_id=agl.u_id and ar.acr_ox = 'o' group by agl.accomp_group_num

select ar.u_id, AGL.ACCOMP_GROUP_NUM,ar.acr_ox,ar.acr_num from Accomp_group ag, Accomp_group_list agl, AccompanyRequest ar where agl.accomp_group_num=#{accomp_group_num} and AGL.U_ID=AR.U_ID and agl.accomp_list_num=ag.accomp_group_num and ag.accomp_group_num=ar.accomp_group_num
mapper.update: update accompanyrequest set acr_ox ='o' where acr_num = #{acr_num}
update accompanyrequest set acr_ox ='x' where acr_num = #{acr_num}
mapper.insert: insert into accompanyrequest values((select max(ACR_NUM) from accompanyrequest)+1, 'X', #{accomp_group_num}, #{u_id})
